events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection, requesting to file a new claim for the accident occurring on February 28th.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident category based on keywords in the report describing a car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer in navigating through the claim process following the vehicle accident.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and notified the customer that the investigation would begin shortly.
Requested the customer to submit documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to support the claim.
Customer uploaded all required documents, including detailed photos of the vehicle damages and official accident police report.
The claims investigation team began their review of the submitted materials to verify liability and extent of damages stated by the customer.
Investigation finalized with findings confirming the validity of the claim and the extent of damages to the customer's vehicle.
Proposed a settlement package to the customer covering all repair costs and additional rental car reimbursement for the accident.
Customer responded with positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and thoroughness of the claim process.
Official approval granted for the insurance claim, confirming the compensation amount and coverage dates agreed upon with the customer.
Processed the payment to the customer's designated account to cover the vehicle repairs and any associated costs.
Closed the claim file after confirming that the customer received funds and repairs were underway without further issues.
